taskTitle: E2E: Basic UI load and canvas interactions

subtasks.description:
E2E: Basic UI load and canvas interactions

Test that user can see UI load with basic buttons and interact with canvas. Covers: HUD-010 (pan canvas), HUD-011 (zoom with wheel), HUD-012 (reset view button), HUD-014 (zoom limits). Verify zoom percentage display, cursor changes, and button responsiveness.
